author: jbonofre
msg: Fix typo mistake in the POM.

author: erwan
msg: Some tweaking for the sonar task, putting the work directory in runtime/, and setting values for sonar.java.source and sonar.java.target, which are used in combination with PMD and clover. More info at http://docs.codehaus.org/display/SONAR/Advanced+parameters. Thanks to René Scheibe for the idea

author: scottbw
msg: Fixed "dir" attribute of widget not being set on import, which meant that version attributes were not having the correct i18n text.
